actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: To prohibit the Secretary of Energy from enforcing regulations pertaining to certain battery chargers.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Energy from finalizing, implementing, or enforcing a proposed rule entitled "Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation Standards for Battery Chargers and External Power Supplies," or any substantially similar regulation, regarding product class 7 (certain high-energy battery chargers described in such proposed rule).

titles.title: To prohibit the Secretary of Energy from enforcing regulations pertaining to certain battery chargers.
